title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 323: Featuring Mark Stone + Jeff Marek
description:
On episode 323 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Jeff Marek and Mark Stone. Marek joined (09:32) to discuss the impact Walter Gretzky had on the hockey community, the Calgary Flames coaching change, Jack Eichel and tons more. The boys also open up the show recapping their Florida trip and discussing the infamous live stream where RA went missing. The boys then give their opinions on the Tom Wilson suspension, Keith Yandle’s 1000th game and they even discuss the topic of slew foots. Mark Stone joined the show (01:26:52) to break down his hot start to the season, the Golden Knights locker room, and to talk some 2017 Senators. The guys wrap up the show talking about the North Division, Zach Parise and give their take on the Calgary Flames.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
